article:
Different people have different hobbies. For example  , some _ reading, some like swimming and others like collecting and so on.
Do you want to _ my hobby? I like _ and listening to the Red Songs  , like my grandparents. I think these _ sound   very great. I can sing many red songs _ I Love You, China (<<,>> ), and Learn From Lei Feng (<<>> ).
Besides (...), I think playing sports every day is helpful. I like playing basketball . I'm good at it. I think it's very interesting. I also like playing it with my _ in PE class. _ team work . Everyone _ to work together   with others. I can also make many friends in the game.
